TITLE: Episode 97 - The Real Deal with Kristen Meghan
DESCRIPTION: Listen to the experts, right? Oh, wait... not THOSE experts. This week, Jessie and Maddie bring on an actual subject matter expert, industrial hygienist, whistleblower, fellow podcaster, and badass lady voluntaryist, Kristen Meghan of Real Deal Media, to discuss the latest forms of medical tyranny and torture, especially as it relates to our kids.
